history.text: Hello there!
Hey there
hope day going well. did you just watch a movie?
Are you intersted in the movie Bruce Almighty? It stars Jim Carrey , Morgan Freeman and Jennifer Anniston
Oh that sounds like something I would like, is it a comedy?

Oh yeah...it's funny. Jim Carrey isn't doing too well at his job as a TV reporter, so he compalined to God that he was not doing his job correctly, so God bet him he couldn't do his job as God for a week.
oh that sounds pretty interesting and appealing! I do like those actors and actresses too!
how are the ratings?
Surprisingly, 48% with Rotten Tomatoes, 46/100 Metacritic Score but the CinemaScore was an A
little bit all over there place there. so does he do good as being god?
Well, the critics think he lost his focus, but it was certainly hilarious!
I may have to look into it! what was one of your favorite scenes?
OH yeah, I forgot that Steve Carell was in this as the guy he lost his promotion to.
I like steve carell , he is normally pretty funny too
Yeah... i think there was a scene where he made a fool of himself over this girl he had a crush on
very slapstick funny
is morgan freeman a main character?
steve carell was very mean at the same time. There was one part where he stole Bruce's speech when accepting the promotion.
i just wondered since u said he takes over gods position.
Yes, Morgaqn Fr3eeman is God himself
thats a great person to play character of god with his calm voice
Definitely a great pick
how old is the movie?
Bruce used his position as god to get great stories to try to get his standing back as an anchor. plus he sabotaged steve carell's character several times
the movie is from 2003...so 15 years!
wow, pretty old then.   so he is abusing the power of god... does he help anyone or do any good?
He discovered the body of Jimmy Hoffa? lol
He also intercepted a meteor
I had to google jimmy Hoffa lol
so he does a bit of good, is there a moral to the movie tho at the end , a purpose?
aww lol
He finally learned a lesson that life was good just the way he had it. So he calmed down a bit and settled down with his girlfriend
I will have to rent it for sure!
yeah..i must see it again
